Parameter.Name: Relative Permittivity
Parameter.Whatis: Give the relative permittivity compared to vacuum.

Parameter.Name: Reference Temperature
Parameter.Whatis: This keyword is used to give the temperature occuring in the Boltzmann factor.

Parameter.Name: Charge Number
Parameter.Whatis: For symmetric cases the charge number. For unsymmetric cases one should give separately Positive Charge Number and Negative Charge Number.

Parameter.Name: Ion Density
Parameter.Whatis: For symmetric cases the original density of ions. For unsymmetric cases one should give separately Positive Ion Density and Negative Ion Density.

Parameter.Name: Poisson Boltzmann Alpha
Parameter.Whatis: Parameter Alpha in the non-dimensionalized form of the PBE.

Parameter.Name: Poisson Boltzmann Beta
Parameter.Whatis: Parameter Beta in the non-dimensionalized form of the PBE.

Parameter.Name: Potential
Parameter.Whatis: Give the initial condition for electric potential.

Parameter.Name: Calculate Electric Field
Parameter.Whatis: Calculate the electric field from the electric potential.

Parameter.Name: Calculate Electric Charge
Parameter.Whatis: Calculate the electric charge from the electric potential.

Parameter.Name: Constant Weights
Parameter.Whatis: Use constant weights in computing nodal values of derived fields rather than weighing by element Jacobian.

Parameter.Name: Potential
Parameter.Whatis: Give potential value for this boundary.

Parameter.Name: Potential Condition
Parameter.Whatis: If the given value is less than zero, apply flux condition insted of the Dirichlet Condition. To be generally useful space and/or time varying values may be given.

Parameter.Name: Surface Charge
Parameter.Whatis: Give electric flux equivalent to the surface charge density.
